column2: BRIEF-Central Pacific Financial Corp. Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.48 April 25 (Reuters) - Central Pacific Financial Corp: * CENTRAL PACIFIC FINANCIAL CORP. REPORTS $14.3 MILLION FIRST QUARTER EARNINGS * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.46 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * NET INTEREST INCOME FOR Q1 OF 2018 WAS $42.3 MILLION, COMPARED TO $41.3 MILLION IN YEAR-AGO QUARTER Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
